title: ihml.
body: browsing boards to pass time while in queue, i check my client and im not in queue.. km ples{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Hey mate, sarcastic or not please try to keep this kind of language away from the forums ^^

We want to try to make this a place for constructive criticism, learning from each other and most importantly fun for all ^^

Be aware that different people can interpret your comment in many different ways so you need to be careful.
I did that before while waiting out a 20-minute leaverbuster :'(
League currently has problems actually coming to the front of the screen to tell you a game is here.
